Uses of Package
org.drooms.api

  • Packages that use org.drooms.api 
    Package Description
    org.drooms.api  
  • Classes in org.drooms.api used by org.drooms.api 
    Class and Description
    Collectible
    Represents an item that occasionally pops up on the Playground.
    CustomPathBasedStrategy
    A strategy that provides its own path-finding algorithm to be used by the game.
    Edge
    Represents a connection (a route) between two immediately adjacent Nodes in a Playground.
    GameProgressListener
    Tracks progress of the game.
    Move
    The various possibilities for the worm to move in.
    Node
    A single indivisible place on the Playground, where (part of) a worm or a wall can be located.
    Player
    Represents a worm in the Game on the Playground.
    Playground
    Represents a playing field for the worms as a graph of Nodes and Edges.
    Strategy
    Represents a Player's strategy for a worm to move around on a Playground.
